text: Roy Lee "Rocky" Dennis (December 4, 1961 - October 4, 1978) was an American boy who had craniodiaphyseal dysplasia, an extremely rare, sclerotic bone disease. The condition usually results in neurological disorders and death during childhood. His body was donated to UCLA Medical Center after he died.Roy L. title: Roy L. Dennis
